title: How do write a 2 to 4 page essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: Usually by putting pen to paper, so to speak. Pick your subject, read up on it, study it and then write all your thoughts about it. Select paragraphs from the original material to use as reference points and talk about that. Etc. You just write it out, basically. it also depends on what, precisely, you’re trying to write about or how your teacher wants you to write it. And don’t plagiarize. Most teachers will catch that. Make sure you use your own thoughts and words.
